question_text.en: When income tax is 8 paise in a rupee, a person's net income is ₹309580. What will be his net income if the income tax is raised to 12 paise?

trick_application: Income tax at 8 paise per rupee = 8%
Now, income tax at 12 paise per rupee = 12%

text.en: When income tax is 8 paise in a rupee, a person's net income is ₹309580. What will be his net income if the income tax is raised to 12 paise?
